description: Try our easy to follow Thai-Style Beef Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Thai beef salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai-Style Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a wok or frying pan on high heat.
Spray beef strips lightly with oil. Cook in three separate batches for 3-4 minutes until well browned. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil and rest.
Combine tomatoes, cucumber, shallots, herbs and chilli in a large bowl. Set aside.
Whisk dressing ingredients together in a jug until sugar has dissolved.
Mix through salad with beef strips and serve.
